text: Roza Kostandyan (born 20 May 2000), known professionally as Rosa Linn, is an Armenian singer. == Career == In 2022, she represented Armenia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2022 with the song "Snap". She finished in 20th place. However, the song went viral on TikTok and became popular worldwide. It has over one billion streams on Spotify and is the second most-streamed Eurovision song on the app. She has supported Ed Sheeran at five performances on his North American tour. ==References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian singers
title: Rosa Linn
